doc.field: PEAT MARWICK AND NOLAN NORTON TO MERGE

- [Peat Marwick], an accounting and management consulting firm, and [Nolan, Norton and Co], an information and technology planning concern, said they have merged. The companies said with the merger Nolan now will be known as Nolan, Norton and Co-partners, the information technology arm of Peat Marwick. Also as part of the merger, Nolan's 21 principals have become Peat Marwick partners, the companies said.
